item.title: Massimiliano
item.description: Email: massimiliano.furlan[at]studio.unibo.it GitHub: https://github.com/massimilianofurlangit About Me I am student. Research Interest I like infinitely repeated games. Equations $$ v_\pi(s_t) = \max_{a_t \in A(s_t)} \! \big\{ E_F\! \left[r_{t} + \delta v_\pi \! \left(s_{t+1}\right)| s_t,a_t\right] \big\}, \quad r_t, s_{t+1} \sim F(r_t,s_{t+1}| s_t,a_t)$$ Publications None.
